name: WeeklyTop3
tag_list: todo, to-do, to-do-lists, weekly-updates, weekly-reports, collaboration-tool, weeklytop3, wt3
description: To-do lists for teams and execs
overview: WeeklyTop3 encourages individuals, teams and executives to stay focused on and share their top priorities each week (using to-do lists). Create your update and prioritize your to-do’s, then mark them complete each week (those that you don’t mark complete, move to the next week automatically). You can share your updates securely within your company (visibility currently restricted by email domain). You can go back in time as well to view what you committed to personally or as a team. Can also be used as a management tool, as you can quickly see what your team members are focused on and it only takes them seconds to update.
